title: Lent 2020 Week 5 with Sally Lloyd Jones
description:
For week five of our Lent series, Raechel and Amanda are joined by the always charming and immensely talented Sally Lloyd-Jones! A New York Times bestselling author, Sally’s work is beloved by children and adults alike. On this episode, she helps us find God’s phone number in the book of Jeremiah, offers tips for sharing the gospel with kids, and reads one of her favorite stories from The Jesus Storybook Bible.

Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 5 of the She Reads Truth Lent reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Lent collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com 

Save 20% on all She Reads Truth Bibles when you use the code PODCAST20. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/lent-2020-week-5-with-sally-lloyd-jones/
